summary: PED is a devastating enteric disease caused by the virus. it is an RNA virus in the genus Alphacoronavirus. the virus is posing a threat to the swine industry worldwide (3–7). nucleocapsid (N) (nt 26379 to 27704), 3′-UTR (nt 27705 to 28038), and a poly(A) tail (nt 28038 to 28079) complete genome sequence of CH/JXJA/2017 shared the highest nucleotide identity (99.2%) with CH/ZMDZY/11 (GenBank accession number KC196276) the complete genome sequence of PEDV strain CH/JXJA/2017 has been deposited in GenBank under the accession number MF375374. Accession number(s).
